metadata.Title: CVE-2017-1000382 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low
metadata.Description: VIM version 8.0.1187 (and other versions most likely) ignores umask whencreating a swap file ("[ORIGINAL_FILENAME].swp") resulting in files thatmay be world readable or otherwise accessible in ways not intended by theuser running the vi binary.

criterions.comment: vim: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
